name: PixKeeper
storyline: World... It always holds secrets and discoveries that we will learn. A team of ordinary guys must fight against the mighty army of evil Lord Erlion, who is going to destroy the country of these brave heroes! Immerse yourself in a voxel 2.5D world! Together with you, you will call your loyal friends who can protect you and your Homeland at the cost of their own lives. In battle, each team member reveals new abilities that they did not know about before! You will learn what incredible passive and active skills an archer, mage, and knight can learn! Save the kingdom from defeat!
summary: You play as ordinary guys, just like you! Awaken your strategic thinking, mentor, hero, and defender! Upgrade your heroes, learn, set goals, explore secret blueprints, defeat the Lord, protect the kingdom!
